submenu.title: Restore Settings Menu
submenu.item: WORD='xtraEvent'; BACKUP='/hdd/Plugin_Backup/settings_backup_xtraEvent'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='weathermsn'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_weathermsn'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='WeatherPlugin'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_WeatherPlugin'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='VisualWeather'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_VisualWeather'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='OAW'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_OAWeather'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='accuweather'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_AccuWeather'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='blue'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_blueMetal_skin'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='subtitles'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_subtitlesSupport'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='timezone'; BACKUP='/media/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_timezone'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3
